name: Fruit Warehouse(A Warehouse Website)
bullatePoint: ● This is a fruit warehouse management website.● By creating a user account on this website, one can add products if he/she wants and deletes if he/she wants.● The user can update the product if desired and deliver the product by increasing/ decreasing the product quantity .
technologies: ★ Technologies: React, Bootstrap, React-Hooks ,React Query, Node.js,Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase

name: Bicycle Parts(A Parts Manufacturer Website)
bullatePoint: ● A buyer can buy bicycle manufacturer parts from this site.● A buyer should have an account to purchase products.● An admin can regulate all operations of this website like product add,update, manage order, make admin etc.
technologies: ★ Technologies: React ,Tailwind ,Daisy-UI, React-Hooks ,React Query,Node.js, Express.js,MongoDB, Firebase

name: Tourist Destination!(Independent Service Provider)
bullatePoint: ● Some rights have been protected in this website so that the user cannot enter without login.● Authentication system has been implement here.
